application.filename: Nobita's Journey to Nowhere - The Beginning
application.name: Nobita's Journey to Nowhere - The Beginning

description.text: Nobita along with Doraemon and his friends went out for a tour to Nowwhere where Doraemon got kidnapped by Nokachima. Now, its your duty to help Nobita and his friends to save Doraemon from Nokachima and keep their friendship alive.

initialWindow.title: Nobita's Journey to Nowhere - The Beginning
